hello everyone: can any one help me. should i recompile my kernel headers while i am installing indiswrapper
i don't recommend recompiling your own kernel, ever, unless you've got a lot of spare time on your hands and want to learn
ndiswrapper doesn't require recompilation of anything, but if you're compiling ndiswrapper yourself, you should have your kernel headers installed... did you want to know how to do that?
